title: GS Mikami: Gokuraku Daisakusen!!
original_name: GS 美神 極楽大作戦!!
sinopse: Her name is Mikami and she is a Ghost Sweeper by profession. She's also the sexiest exorcist/bounty hunter you will ever meet! When an evil vampire sorcerer returns to Tokyo after a 100-year absence, Mikami is hired to track him and his menacing assistant down before they take over the city.
